scenes.action_text: ALAN (CONT’D) I’ve seen the devil, and he is me. Suddenly, a GOLF CLUB strikes his wrist, knocking the gun from his hand. Screaming, Little Tim hits him again, in the knee. Alan twists around, STRIKES HIS HEAD on the mirror, hard. And falls to the floor in front of it. Kaylie raises the club, and holds it above her. Alan reaches up, holding his head, looks up at her. She’s not swinging. Alan grabs Kaylie BY THE THROAT. She fights back, but is no match. LITTLE TIM (shouts) Dad! Alan turns, TIM IS HOLDING THE GUN. His hand SHAKING. LITTLE TIM (CONT’D) Let her go! Alan slowly releases Kaylie, looking at Tim. The gun shaking, but pointed at Alan. Alan reaches out, grabs the barrel of the gun, but instead of taking it away, he STEADIES IT. Over Tim’s shoulder, he sees the watching silver eyes of the “spectral audience” of the mirror’s previous victims. For the first time in a long time, we see the HUMANITY RETURN to Alan’s eyes. He looks at Kaylie. Then at the gun, and at Tim’s FINGER ON THE TRIGGER. He looks into his son’s face, and we see that ALAN IS BACK, HE KNOWS WHAT’S HAPPENING - AND HE KNOWS WHAT HE HAS TO DO TO KEEP HIS CHILDREN SAFE. ALAN (quietly) Run. He smiles a little as he reaches out, PUTTING HIS THUMB OVER TIM’S FINGER ON THE TRIGGER. He tries to smile as he looks into Tim’s eyes and PUSHES THE TRIGGER, SHOOTING HIMSELF.
